title.rendered: Personalize Your Marketing With Dynamic Content

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570735678697{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1528319921982{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]“74% of online consumers get frustrated with websites when content appears that has nothing to do with their interests.” – Janrain

So how can marketers meet this high demand for super-personalized communications?  The answer lies in dynamic content.

In this free guide, see 7 simple ways marketers can use dynamic content to connect with audiences in a more organic and personalized way.

Grab your copy to find out:

  • How top brands like Netflix and Amazon use dynamic content.
  • The marketing automation features that enable you to deliver personalized experiences.
  • Ways to personalize your emails, landing pages, forms, pop-ups and more using dynamic content.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]”Five years ago, people were awed when Amazon could recommend a product they’d love. Today, users expect that Netflix will recommend another binge-worthy series based on their tastes. To keep up, marketers need the power of dynamic content.”[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”164309″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_html]JTNDc2NyaXB0JTNFJTBBJTI0JTI4ZG9jdW1lbnQlMjkucmVhZHklMjhmdW5jdGlvbiUyOCUyOSU3QiUwQSUyMCUyNCUyOCUyMmlmcmFtZSUyMiUyOS5hdHRyJTI4JTIyc2Nyb2xsaW5nJTIyJTJDJTIwJTIybm8lMjIlMjklM0IlMEElN0QlMjklM0IlMEElM0MlMkZzY3JpcHQlM0U=[/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row]
